leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-变异检测与基因分型生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: CLI + 评测套件 + 数据集

queries: [WEB] deep learning snp indel caller github

tools.name: Aldy
tools.one_line_profile: Allelic decomposition and exact genotyping for highly polymorphic genes
tools.detailed_description: Aldy is a tool for allelic decomposition and exact genotyping of highly polymorphic and structurally variant genes, such as CYP2D6, using sequencing data.

tools.name: Long Ranger
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for 10x Genomics Linked-Read data
tools.detailed_description: Long Ranger is a set of analysis pipelines that processes 10x Genomics Linked-Read data to align reads, call variants, phase haplotypes, and detect structural variants.

tools.name: Vartrix
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell genotyping tool for 10x Genomics data
tools.detailed_description: Vartrix is a tool for extracting single-cell genotype information from 10x Genomics single-cell data, enabling the evaluation of variants in individual cells.

tools.name: yhaplo
tools.one_line_profile: Y-chromosome haplogroup identification tool
tools.detailed_description: yhaplo identifies Y-chromosome haplogroups in arbitrarily large samples of sequenced or genotyped men, traversing the Y-chromosome phylogenetic tree.

tools.name: EnsembleVariantCallingPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble pipeline for SNV and INDEL variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that performs SNV and INDEL variant calling using an ensemble of callers (Mutect2, Strelka2, Varscan2, MuSE) to improve accuracy.

tools.name: Crossbow
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-based variant calling from sequence reads
tools.detailed_description: Crossbow is a cloud-computing software tool for performing alignment and variant calling on large-scale sequencing data.

tools.name: BCFTools (Bruker)
tools.one_line_profile: Unpacker for Bruker Esprit BCF data files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to unpack and process Bruker Esprit (.bcf) data files used in electron microscopy and spectroscopy (EDX/EBSD). Note: Distinct from the bioinformatics bcftools.

tools.name: Control-FREEC
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number and genotype annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: Control-FREEC is a tool for copy number variation (CNV) detection and genotype annotation using whole genome and whole exome sequencing data.

tools.name: AntCaller
tools.one_line_profile: SNP calling and genotyping for damaged DNA
tools.detailed_description: AntCaller is a tool designed for SNP calling and genotyping specifically in damaged DNA samples, such as ancient DNA.

tools.name: Opossum
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq read pre-processing for variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Opossum is a tool to pre-process RNA-seq reads prior to variant calling, helping to remove noise and improve calling accuracy.

tools.name: PopGenTools
tools.one_line_profile: SNP/Genotype calling and population genetics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for SNP and genotype calling based on ANGSD, along with downstream population genetics analyses.

tools.name: tb_variant_filter
tools.one_line_profile: VCF filtering tool for M. tuberculosis
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for filtering Variant Call Format (VCF) files, specifically tailored for Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv genomes.

tools.name: CalliNGS-NF
tools.one_line_profile: GATK RNA-Seq Variant Calling Workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the GATK Best Practices for RNA-Seq variant calling.

tools.name: LoFreq Star
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitive variant calling from sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: LoFreq is a fast and sensitive variant-caller for inferring SNVs and indels from next-generation sequencing data, designed to call low-frequency variants.

tools.name: VEF
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble-based filter for VCF files
tools.detailed_description: Variant Ensemble Filter (VEF) is a tool that filters VCF files using an ensemble approach to improve variant quality.

tools.name: SNVCallingWorkflow
tools.one_line_profile: DKFZ SNV-Calling Workflow
tools.detailed_description: The standard SNV-calling workflow used by DKFZ-ODCF for processing cancer genomics data.

tools.name: Graphtyper
tools.one_line_profile: Population-scale genotyping using pangenome graphs
tools.detailed_description: Graphtyper is a tool for population-scale genotyping that utilizes pangenome graphs to improve alignment and variant calling accuracy.

tools.name: GEFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for genotype-environment interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: GEFormer is a deep learning-based genome-wide prediction model designed to predict phenotypes (e.g., maize) by jointly analyzing genotype and environment interactions.

tools.name: vcf_annotation_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for VCF filtering and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to filter, annotate, and prepare VCF data for downstream analysis using tools like GATK4, SnpSift, and VEP.

tools.name: EpiDiverse SNP
tools.one_line_profile: Bisulfite SNP-Calling and Methylation Clustering Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for calling SNPs from bisulfite sequencing data and performing methylation clustering.

tools.name: MindTheGap
tools.one_line_profile: Insertion variant caller and local assembler
tools.detailed_description: MindTheGap is a structural variant caller dedicated to detecting insertion variants from short read sequencing data, also capable of local assembly.

tools.name: snp_calling_bcftools_slurm
tools.one_line_profile: SLURM-based bcftools SNP calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for performing SNP calling using bcftools, optimized for execution on SLURM-managed clusters.

tools.name: DeNovoCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for de novo variant calling
tools.detailed_description: DeNovoCNN uses deep convolutional neural networks to call de novo variants from next-generation sequencing data.

tools.name: GenomicsDB
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance storage for genomic variants
tools.detailed_description: GenomicsDB is a high-performance data storage system designed for importing, querying, and transforming genomic variant data, often used in GATK workflows.

tools.name: sv-channels
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based structural variant filtering
tools.detailed_description: sv-channels is a method that uses deep learning to filter structural variant calls, improving the precision of SV detection.

tools.name: Clair
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural network for germline variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Clair is a deep neural network-based variant caller that operates on pileup data to detect germline variants.

tools.name: Clair-Mosaic
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for mosaic small variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Clair-Mosaic is a deep learning-based tool specifically designed for calling mosaic small variants from long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: Clair3
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance long-read variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Clair3 combines pileup and full-alignment models using deep learning to achieve high performance in long-read variant calling.

tools.name: Clair3-MP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-platform variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Clair3-MP is an extension of Clair3 designed for variant calling using sequencing data from multiple platforms.

tools.name: Clair3-Nova
tools.one_line_profile: De novo variant calling in trios using long reads
tools.detailed_description: Clair3-Nova is a tool for de novo variant calling in trio samples using Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: Clair3-RNA
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read small variant caller for RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: Clair3-RNA is a deep learning-based small variant caller optimized for long-read RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: Clair3-Trio
tools.one_line_profile: Trio variant calling using Nanopore long-reads
tools.detailed_description: Clair3-Trio is a variant calling tool that leverages trio information and Nanopore long-reads to improve accuracy.

tools.name: ClairS
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read somatic small variant calling
tools.detailed_description: ClairS is a deep learning method designed for somatic small variant calling using long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: ClairS-TO
tools.one_line_profile: Tumor-only somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: ClairS-TO is a deep learning method for calling somatic variants in tumor-only samples (without matched normal).

tools.name: USeq
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of tools for NGS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: USeq is a collection of over 180 Java applications for analyzing next-generation sequencing data, including ChIP-Seq, RNA-Seq, and variant analysis.

tools.name: alignment-nf
tools.one_line_profile: WES/WGS alignment pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for Whole Exome and Whole Genome Sequencing alignment, facilitating reproducible data processing.

tools.name: gatk4-GenotypeGVCFs-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Joint calling workflow for gVCFs
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for joint calling of gVCF files using GATK4 GenotypeGVCFs, following GATK Best Practices.

tools.name: gatk4-HaplotypeCaller-nf
tools.one_line_profile: GATK4 HaplotypeCaller workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for running GATK4 HaplotypeCaller in gVCF mode, serving as the first step for cohort joint genotyping.

tools.name: needlestack
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-sample somatic variant caller for detecting low-allelic fraction variants
tools.detailed_description: needlestack is a multi-sample somatic variant caller designed to detect variants with low allelic fraction (AF) in Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data. It estimates the distribution of sequencing errors to distinguish true somatic variants from noise, making it suitable for cancer genomics research.

tools.name: Cyrius
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate CYP2D6 genotyping using whole-genome sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Cyrius is a software tool designed to accurately genotype the complex CYP2D6 gene using whole-genome sequencing (WGS) data. It handles the high homology between CYP2D6 and its pseudogenes, providing star-allele calling which is critical for pharmacogenomics.

tools.name: Pisces
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic and germline variant caller for amplicon sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Pisces is a variant caller optimized for amplicon sequencing data, capable of detecting both somatic and germline small variants. It is particularly recommended for tumor-only workflows and includes modules for variant calling, filtering, and output generation.

tools.name: Canvas
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number variant (CNV) calling from DNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Canvas is a tool for calling copy number variants (CNVs) from germline and somatic DNA sequencing data. It supports various workflows including whole-genome sequencing (WGS), whole-exome sequencing (WES), and targeted panels.

tools.name: Paragraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph realignment tools for accurate structural variant genotyping
tools.detailed_description: Paragraph is a suite of graph-based realignment tools designed to accurately genotype structural variants (SVs) and indels using short-read sequencing data. It constructs sequence graphs to represent haplotypes and aligns reads to these graphs to improve genotyping accuracy.

tools.name: Strelka2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate germline and somatic small variant caller
tools.detailed_description: Strelka2 is a fast and accurate small variant caller optimized for germline and somatic analysis of whole genome and exome sequencing data. It employs a mixture model to estimate variant probabilities and is widely used in production pipelines.

tools.name: frequencyFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Allele frequency filtering for Mendelian variant discovery
tools.detailed_description: frequencyFilter is an R tool designed to filter variants based on allele frequency to aid in the discovery of Mendelian disease variants. It helps researchers narrow down candidate variants by excluding those that are too common in reference populations.

tools.name: Varscan2 Scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for running Varscan2 copy number variation calling
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains shell scripts to facilitate the execution of Varscan2 for copy number variation (CNV) calling on tumor and normal BAM files. It serves as a workflow wrapper for the Varscan2 tool.

tools.name: EVG
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble pipeline for graph-based variant genotyping
tools.detailed_description: EVG (Ensemble Variant Genotyping) is a pipeline that integrates graph-based methods for accurate variant genotyping, particularly effective with lower depth short reads. It aims to improve genotyping performance by combining multiple approaches.

tools.name: genotype_plot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualisation of genotypes from VCF files
tools.detailed_description: genotype_plot is an R package providing functions to visualize genotypes directly from VCF files. It allows researchers to create graphical representations of genotype calls across samples to assess quality and distribution.

tools.name: KalmanFilter.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Kalman Filter implementations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing various Kalman Filters including KF, UKF, and AUKF. While primarily a general signal processing tool, it is a valid scientific computing library for estimation tasks.

tools.name: KalmanFilters.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Various Kalman Filter implementations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing implementations of Kalman Filters (KF, UKF, AUKF) and their square root variants. It is a general-purpose scientific tool for state estimation.

tools.name: GATK-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Shell script implementation of the GATK variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A shell script that implements the standard GATK pipeline for variant calling. It automates the steps from alignment processing to variant calling, facilitating reproducible analysis.

tools.name: Seave
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for filtering and annotating genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: Seave is a web-based platform designed for the filtering, annotation, and analysis of genomic variants. It supports various inheritance patterns and integrates with disease databases to aid in pathogenicity prediction and clinical reporting.

tools.name: Optimized_GATK4_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized GATK4 pipeline for variant calling and processing
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline for processing FASTQ/BAM files and performing variant calling, filtering, and annotation using GATK4. It aims to streamline the standard GATK best practices workflow.

tools.name: Severus
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic structural variant calling using long reads
tools.detailed_description: Severus is a bioinformatics tool developed for detecting somatic structural variants (SVs) in cancer genomes using long-read sequencing data. It leverages the length of reads to resolve complex rearrangements.

tools.name: IMSindel
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate intermediate-size indel detection tool
tools.detailed_description: IMSindel is a tool for detecting intermediate-size insertions and deletions (indels) that are often missed by standard aligners. It incorporates de novo assembly and gapped global-local alignment with split read analysis to improve detection accuracy.

tools.name: GEMSCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Joint variant calling pipeline with GATK4, DeepVariant, and Strelka2
tools.detailed_description: GEMSCAN is a Snakemake-based pipeline for joint variant calling. It orchestrates multiple callers including GATK4 HaplotypeCaller, Google DeepVariant, and Strelka2 to provide comprehensive variant detection.

tools.name: VariantWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning based variant calling toolkit
tools.detailed_description: VariantWorks is a framework to enable the development of deep learning-based genomic variant callers. It provides tools for encoding genomic data and training models, facilitating the application of AI to variant detection.

tools.name: Octopus v4
tools.one_line_profile: On-device language model for function calling and agentic AI
tools.detailed_description: Octopus v4 is a specialized language model designed for graph-based function calling and agent orchestration. While primarily an AI research tool, it represents a scientific artifact in the field of Large Language Models.

tools.name: snv-calling-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for SNV calling using multiple callers
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed for Single Nucleotide Variant (SNV) calling. It integrates GATK4/MuTect2, CaVEMan/Pindel, and Strelka2 to provide a robust consensus or comparative calling approach.

tools.name: Spark-GATK
tools.one_line_profile: Genomics analysis framework based on Apache Spark and ADAM
tools.detailed_description: Spark-GATK is a distributed genomics analysis framework that leverages Apache Spark and ADAM to accelerate GATK-based workflows. It is designed to handle large-scale genomic data processing efficiently.

tools.name: pbsv
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio structural variant (SV) calling and analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: pbsv is a suite of tools developed by Pacific Biosciences for calling and analyzing structural variants from PacBio long-read sequencing data. It is optimized for the error profile and read length of PacBio HiFi and CLR data.

tools.name: trgt
tools.one_line_profile: Tandem repeat genotyping and visualization from PacBio HiFi data
tools.detailed_description: trgt is a tool for genotyping and visualizing tandem repeats using PacBio HiFi sequencing data. It provides accurate sizing and methylation analysis of repeat expansions, which are critical for many genetic diseases.

tools.name: PathOS
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical application for filtering, analysing and reporting on NGS variants
tools.detailed_description: PathOS is a clinical-grade software application designed for the curation, filtering, analysis, and reporting of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) variants. It facilitates the translation of genomic data into clinical reports.

tools.name: bioluigi
tools.one_line_profile: Reusable Luigi tasks for bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: bioluigi provides a collection of reusable tasks for the Luigi workflow engine, specifically tailored for bioinformatics pipelines. It simplifies the creation of complex, dependency-managed genomic analysis workflows.

tools.name: cue
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for SV calling and genotyping
tools.detailed_description: cue is a deep learning-based framework designed for the calling and genotyping of structural variants (SVs). It utilizes neural networks to learn features from sequencing data for improved SV detection.

tools.name: Mapping_SNP_Indel_calling
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping and SNP/Indel calling pipeline for IWGSC reference
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based pipeline implementing BWA and GATK for mapping and SNP/Indel calling. It is specifically configured for use with the IWGSC pseudo-chromosomal reference sequence, addressing specific needs in wheat genomics.

tools.name: arcasHLA
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate in silico inference of HLA genotypes from RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: arcasHLA is a computational tool for inferring HLA genotypes directly from RNA-seq data. It provides high-resolution genotyping of HLA class I and II genes, which is essential for immunogenomics research.

tools.name: GATK_pipeline_customized
tools.one_line_profile: Customized GATK pipeline for GBS/RAD/SLAF-seq SNP calling
tools.detailed_description: A customized GATK pipeline optimized for SNP calling from reduced representation sequencing data such as GBS, RAD-seq, and SLAF-seq. It is designed to run on High Performance Computing (HPC) environments.

tools.name: TIDDIT
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant calling tool
tools.detailed_description: TIDDIT is a tool for the detection of structural variants (SVs) in whole genome sequencing data. It uses split-read and discordant pair analysis to identify various types of SVs, including large deletions and translocations.

tools.name: sentieon-dnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts and documentation for Sentieon DNAseq workflow
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides scripts and guidelines for running the Sentieon DNAseq pipeline, a high-performance implementation of the GATK best practices for variant calling. It facilitates the deployment of Sentieon's accelerated genomics tools.

tools.name: Variants2Neoantigen
tools.one_line_profile: Neoantigen calling pipeline from variant records
tools.detailed_description: Variants2Neoantigen is a pipeline that predicts neoantigens starting from variant record files (MAF). It automates the process of identifying potential immunogenic peptides arising from somatic mutations.

tools.name: ilus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline generator for WGS/WES analysis using GATK and Sentieon
tools.detailed_description: ilus is a lightweight tool to generate variant calling pipelines for Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) and Whole Exome Sequencing (WES). It supports both GATK and Sentieon backends, simplifying the creation of analysis workflows.

tools.name: TeraStructure
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm to fit Bayesian models of genetic variation in human populations on tera-sample-sized data sets
tools.detailed_description: TeraStructure is a new algorithm to fit Bayesian models of genetic variation in human populations on tera-sample-sized data sets (10^12 observed genotypes, i.e., 1M individuals at 1M SNPs). This package provides a scalable, multi-threaded C++ implementation that can be run on a single computer.

tools.name: HAT-FLEX
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible Trio De Novo Variant (DNV) detection on existing VCFs
tools.detailed_description: Flexible Trio DNV detection on existing VCFs.

tools.name: covigator-ngs-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for NGS variant calling on SARS-CoV-2
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for NGS variant calling on SARS-CoV-2. From FASTQ files to normalized and annotated VCF files from GATK, BCFtools, LoFreq and iVar.

tools.name: seq2HLA
tools.one_line_profile: In-silico method to determine HLA genotypes from RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: In-silico method written in Python and R to determine HLA genotypes of a sample. seq2HLA takes standard RNA-Seq sequence reads in fastq format as input, uses a bowtie index comprising all HLA alleles and outputs the most likely HLA class I and class II genotypes.

tools.name: tronflow-mutect2
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Mutect2 somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Nextflow pipeline for Mutect2 somatic variant calling best practices.

tools.name: tronflow-vcf-postprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow variant normalization pipeline based on vt and bcftools
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow variant normalization pipeline based on vt and bcftools.

tools.name: GenoFLU
tools.one_line_profile: Influenza data pipeline to automate genotyping assignment
tools.detailed_description: Influenza data pipeline to automate genotyping assignment.

tools.name: vSNP
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for validating SNPs
tools.detailed_description: vSNP -- validate SNPs.

tools.name: vSNP3
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for validating SNPs (Version 3)
tools.detailed_description: vSNP -- validate SNPs.

tools.name: dv-trio
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to call variants for a trio using DeepVariant and GATK
tools.detailed_description: dv-trio provides a pipeline to call variants for a trio (father-mother-child) using DeepVariants. Genomic Variant Calling Files (gVCFs) created by DeepVariants are then co_called together using GATK. The resultant trio VCF is then post-processing with FamSeq to eliminate mendelian errors.

tools.name: NanoCaller
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling tool for long-read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Variant calling tool for long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: G2P
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-Wide-Association-Study Simulation Tool for Genotype and Phenotype Simulation
tools.detailed_description: G2P: A Genome-Wide-Association-Study Simulation Tool for Genotype Simulation, Phenotype Simulation, and Power Evaluation.

tools.name: variant-calling-at-scale
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable and High Performance Variant Calling on Cluster Environments
tools.detailed_description: Scalable and High Performance Variant Calling on Cluster Environments.

tools.name: All2
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for filtering variants from all2all comparison of multiple clones or single cells
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering variants from all2all comparison of multiple clones or single cells.

tools.name: CNVnator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for CNV discovery and genotyping from depth-of-coverage
tools.detailed_description: A tool for CNV discovery and genotyping from depth-of-coverage by mapped reads.

tools.name: snpkit
tools.one_line_profile: Modular workflow for Microbial Variant Calling and SNP diagnostics
tools.detailed_description: Modular workflow for Microbial Variant Calling and SNP diagnostics.

tools.name: HyINDEL
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid approach for detection of Insertions and Deletions from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: Hybrid approach for detection of Insertions and Deletions from NGS data.

tools.name: smash
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking toolkit for variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Benchmarking toolkit for variant calling.

tools.name: RNA-seq-variant-calling
tools.one_line_profile: Functions to call variant in RNA-Seq with Mutect2, Varscan, and Vardict
tools.detailed_description: Functions to call variant in RNA-Seq with Mutect2, Varscan, and Vardict.

tools.name: grgl
tools.one_line_profile: Genotype Representation Graph Library
tools.detailed_description: Genotype Representation Graph Library.

tools.name: 16GT
tools.one_line_profile: Simultaneous detection of SNPs and Indels using a 16-genotype probabilistic model
tools.detailed_description: Simultaneous detection of SNPs and Indels using a 16-genotype probabilistic model.

tools.name: Clairvoyante
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task convolutional deep neural network for variant calling in Single Molecule Sequencing
tools.detailed_description: Clairvoyante: a multi-task convolutional deep neural network for variant calling in Single Molecule Sequencing.

tools.name: EIR
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for training deep learning models on genotype and other biological data
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for training deep learning models on genotype, tabular, sequence, image, array and binary data.

tools.name: DeepVariant-on-Spark
tools.one_line_profile: Germline short variant calling pipeline running Google DeepVariant on Apache Spark
tools.detailed_description: DeepVariant-on-Spark is a germline short variant calling pipeline that runs Google DeepVariant on Apache Spark at scale.

tools.name: bcbio-nextgen
tools.one_line_profile: Validated, scalable, community developed variant calling and RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Validated, scalable, community developed variant calling, RNA-seq and small RNA analysis.

tools.name: straglr
tools.one_line_profile: Tandem repeat expansion detection or genotyping from long-read alignments
tools.detailed_description: Tandem repeat expansion detection or genotyping from long-read alignments.

tools.name: biocpp-io
tools.one_line_profile: BioC++ Input/Output library for bioinformatics file formats
tools.detailed_description: BioC++ Input/Output library.

tools.name: BayesTyper
tools.one_line_profile: Method for variant graph genotyping based on exact alignment of k-mers
tools.detailed_description: A method for variant graph genotyping based on exact alignment of k-mers.

tools.name: favr
tools.one_line_profile: Filtering and Annotation of Variants that are Rare
tools.detailed_description: Filtering and Annotation of Variants that are Rare.

tools.name: GBSapp
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Pipeline for Variant/Haplotype Calling and Filtering
tools.detailed_description: Automated Pipeline for Variant/Haplotype Calling and Filtering.

tools.name: SNPSVM
tools.one_line_profile: Support vector machine for calling variants from next-gen sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A support vector machine for calling variants from next-gen sequencing data.

tools.name: echtvar
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid variant annotation and filtering tool
tools.detailed_description: using all the bits for echt rapid variant annotation and filtering.

tools.name: indelope
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to find large indels in the blind spot between GATK/freebayes and SV callers
tools.detailed_description: find large indels (in the blind spot between GATK/freebayes and SV callers).

tools.name: peddy
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for genotype correspondence, ancestry, and sex checks directly on VCF
tools.detailed_description: genotype :: ped correspondence check, ancestry check, sex check. directly, quickly on VCF.

tools.name: slivar
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for genetic variant expressions, annotation, and filtering
tools.detailed_description: genetic variant expressions, annotation, and filtering for great good.

tools.name: smoove
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant calling and genotyping pipeline
tools.detailed_description: structural variant calling and genotyping with existing tools, but, smoothly.

tools.name: GATK (Legacy Core)
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Analysis Toolkit (Legacy Core Engine versions 1.0-3.7)
tools.detailed_description: Official code repository for GATK versions 1.0 through 3.7 (core engine).

tools.name: GATK (Legacy Protected)
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Analysis Toolkit (Legacy Full Package versions 1.0-3.7)
tools.detailed_description: Official code repository for GATK versions 1.0 through 3.7 (full licensed package).

tools.name: SnowmanSV
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variation and indel detection using rolling local string graph assembly
tools.detailed_description: Structural variation and indel detection using rolling local string graph assembly.

tools.name: VariantBam
tools.one_line_profile: Filtering and profiling of next-generational sequencing data using region-specific rules
tools.detailed_description: Filtering and profiling of next-generational sequencing data using region-specific rules.

tools.name: GATK
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Analysis Toolkit for variant discovery in high-throughput sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Official code repository for GATK versions 4 and up. GATK is the industry standard for identifying SNPs and indels in germline DNA and RNAseq data.

tools.name: GATK (Legacy/Protected)
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy repository for the Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) containing older protected versions
tools.detailed_description: This repository hosts the legacy source code for the Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) prior to its full open-sourcing in version 4. It includes implementations of variant discovery and genotyping tools for next-generation sequencing data.

tools.name: GATK-SV
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variation discovery pipeline for short-read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline from the Broad Institute for detecting structural variations (SVs) from short-read sequencing data. It integrates multiple algorithms to call, filter, and genotype SVs.

tools.name: Permutect
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning architecture for somatic and germline variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based variant caller developed by the Broad Institute, designed to efficiently detect both somatic and germline variants using a tensor-based architecture.

tools.name: hap-ibd
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of identity-by-descent segments in phased genotype data
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for detecting identity-by-descent (IBD) segments in phased genotype data, useful for population genetics and relatedness inference.

tools.name: freebayes-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow wrapper for parallelized FreeBayes variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline that implements a parallelized version of the FreeBayes variant caller, designed to improve performance and scalability for variant detection tasks.

tools.name: ScanIndel
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated pipeline for Indel detection
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline specifically designed for the detection of Insertion and Deletion (Indel) variants in genomic sequencing data.

tools.name: GraffiTE
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genotyping polymorphic transposable elements using genome graphs
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that identifies polymorphic transposable elements in genome assemblies or long reads and genotypes them in read sets using genome-graph approaches.

tools.name: bcbio.variation
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for analyzing genomic variation data built on GATK
tools.detailed_description: A Clojure-based toolkit that provides functionality for analyzing genomic variation data, leveraging the GATK framework to facilitate variant calling and processing.

tools.name: SNPGenie
tools.one_line_profile: Estimator for evolutionary diversity measures from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A Perl program for estimating nucleotide diversity measures such as piN/piS and dN/dS from next-generation sequencing SNP data, useful for evolutionary biology.

tools.name: variant-filter
tools.one_line_profile: False-positive filter for variants from massively parallel sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based tool designed to filter out false-positive variant calls generated from massively parallel sequencing data, improving the accuracy of variant detection.

tools.name: DeepGS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for predicting phenotypes from genotypes
tools.detailed_description: An R package that employs deep learning techniques to predict phenotypic traits based on genotypic data, facilitating genomic selection and association studies.

tools.name: savana
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic structural variant caller for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting somatic structural variants specifically from long-read sequencing data, addressing the challenges of SV calling in cancer genomics.

tools.name: cerebra
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for fast summarizing of VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to rapidly summarize and extract information from Variant Call Format (VCF) files, aiding in the downstream analysis of variant data.

tools.name: cnv_facets
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic copy number variant caller for NGS
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting somatic copy number variants (CNVs) from next-generation sequencing data, utilizing the FACETS algorithm.

tools.name: genomics-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-parallelized secondary analysis pipelines for genomics
tools.detailed_description: A set of genomics analysis pipelines, including alignment and variant calling, optimized for parallel execution using Apache Spark on the Databricks platform.

tools.name: TinDaisy
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflow for somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Common Workflow Language (CWL) pipeline for somatic variant calling, developed by the Ding Lab, facilitating reproducible cancer genomics analysis.

tools.name: VarScan
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling and somatic mutation/CNV detection
tools.detailed_description: A popular tool for variant calling (SNPs and Indels) and somatic mutation/CNV detection in next-generation sequencing data, particularly useful for tumor-normal pairs.

tools.name: Bis-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of tools for Bisulfite-seq/NOMe-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for processing Bisulfite-seq and NOMe-seq data, including functionality for SNP and methylation calling (BisSNP) and HMM segmentation.

tools.name: DeepVariant-GLnexus-WDL
tools.one_line_profile: WDL workflow for population variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based workflow that integrates DeepVariant for variant calling and GLnexus for joint genotyping, designed for scalable population sequencing projects.

tools.name: GLnexus
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable gVCF merging and joint variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance tool for merging gVCF files and performing joint variant calling, specifically optimized for large-scale population sequencing projects.

tools.name: GenoTools
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for genotype data processing and QC
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for processing genotype data, including genotype calling from raw data, sample/variant quality control, and ancestry estimation.

tools.name: wf-bacterial-genomes
tools.one_line_profile: Small variant calling workflow for haploid bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A workflow developed by EPI2ME Labs (Oxford Nanopore) for calling small variants in haploid bacterial genomes.

tools.name: kir-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for calling SNPs and haplotypes for KIR genes
tools.detailed_description: A specialized toolkit for analyzing Killer-cell Immunoglobulin-like Receptor (KIR) genes, capable of calling SNPs, alleles, and haplotypes from NGS data.

tools.name: FreeBayes
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian haplotype-based genetic polymorphism discovery
tools.detailed_description: A widely used Bayesian genetic variant detector designed to find small polymorphisms, specifically SNPs, indels, MNPs, and complex events, using haplotype-based calling.

tools.name: scNanoGPS
tools.one_line_profile: Single cell Nanopore sequencing data analysis for Genotype and Phenotype
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing single-cell Nanopore sequencing data to simultaneously infer genotypes and phenotypes, enabling multi-modal analysis at the single-cell level.

tools.name: GATK WGS Germline SNPs/Indels Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Official GATK workflow for germline short variant discovery in WGS data
tools.detailed_description: The standard production workflow from the Broad Institute for discovering germline SNPs and Indels in Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) data using GATK best practices.

tools.name: Five Dollar Genome Analysis Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Cost-optimized WGS data processing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A GATK-based workflow designed for efficient and cost-effective processing of Whole Genome Sequencing data, including alignment and variant calling.

tools.name: GATK RNA-seq Germline SNPs/Indels Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for germline variant discovery in RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A GATK workflow specifically tailored for calling germline SNPs and Indels from RNA sequencing data, handling the unique challenges of RNA-seq such as splicing.

tools.name: GATK CNN Variant Filter
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for filtering variants using Convolutional Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A GATK workflow that applies deep learning (CNNs) to filter variant calls, providing an alternative to traditional hard filtering or VQSR.

tools.name: gatk4-data-processing
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for processing high-throughput sequencing data for variant discovery
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL workflows for processing high-throughput sequencing data, specifically designed for variant discovery using GATK4 and related tools. It handles tasks such as alignment, sorting, and duplicate marking.

tools.name: gatk4-exome-analysis-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: GATK Best Practices pipeline for exome sequencing data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Implements data pre-processing and initial variant calling according to the GATK Best Practices for germline SNP and Indel discovery in human exome sequencing data.

tools.name: gatk4-genome-processing-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Whole genome sequence processing and germline variant calling workflow
tools.detailed_description: Workflows used for processing whole genome sequence (WGS) data and performing germline variant calling. Although archived, it represents a standard GATK pipeline configuration.

tools.name: gatk4-germline-snps-indels
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for germline short variant discovery with GATK4
tools.detailed_description: Dedicated workflows for the discovery of germline short variants (SNPs and Indels) using GATK4, following best practices for germline analysis.

tools.name: gatk4-mitochondria-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for mitochondrial variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A WDL pipeline specifically designed for calling variants in mitochondrial DNA, addressing the unique challenges of mitochondrial genomics such as heteroplasmy.

tools.name: gatk4-pathseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogen detection pipeline using GATK PathSeq
tools.detailed_description: Workflows for detecting microbial organisms in short-read sequencing data using the GATK PathSeq tool.

tools.name: gatk4-rnaseq-germline-snps-indels
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq variant calling workflow
tools.detailed_description: Workflows for processing RNA-seq data to discover germline short variants (SNPs and Indels) using GATK4, including RNA-specific processing steps.

tools.name: gatk4-somatic-cnvs
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic Copy Number Variant (CNV) discovery workflow
tools.detailed_description: Workflows for detecting somatic copy number variants using GATK4, designed for cancer genomics applications.

tools.name: gatk4-somatic-snvs-indels
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic SNV and Indel discovery workflow
tools.detailed_description: Workflows for detecting somatic single nucleotide variants (SNVs) and insertions/deletions (Indels) using GATK4 Mutect2.

tools.name: intel-gatk4-somatic-with-preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Intel-optimized somatic variant calling workflow
tools.detailed_description: Workflows for data pre-processing and initial calling of somatic SNP, Indel, and copy number variants, optimized by Intel for on-premises infrastructure performance.

tools.name: GARFIELD-NGS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for genomic variant filtering
tools.detailed_description: GARFIELD-NGS (Genomic vARiants FIltering by dEep Learning moDels) is a tool that uses deep learning to filter genomic variants in NGS data, improving call quality.

tools.name: gencore-variant-calling-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: HPC-based variant calling pipeline using GATK
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline designed for High Performance Computing (HPC) environments to perform variant calling using GATK tools.

tools.name: variant-calling-pipeline-gatk4
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow variant calling pipeline using GATK4
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible variant calling pipeline implemented in Nextflow, utilizing GATK4 for variant discovery.

tools.name: imputationserver2
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for scalable genotype imputation
tools.detailed_description: The backend workflow for Imputation Server 2, designed to facilitate large-scale genotype imputation.

tools.name: rpd-sg10k-grch38-gatk4-gvcf-freebayes-vcf
tools.one_line_profile: Production genome analytics workflow for SG10K Health
tools.detailed_description: The main genome analytics workflow used for the Singapore NPM Program (SG10K Health), combining GATK4 and FreeBayes for variant calling.

tools.name: DeepSomatic
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based somatic variant caller
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call somatic variants from tumor-normal and tumor-only sequencing data, developed by Google.

tools.name: DeepVariant
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based germline variant caller
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call genetic variants from next-generation DNA sequencing data with high accuracy.

tools.name: vcf2sm
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for polyploid genotype calling
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated pipeline for quantitative genotype calling from next generation sequencing data, specifically designed for polyploid organisms.

tools.name: SMRT
tools.one_line_profile: SNP calling and haplotype assembly for SMRT data
tools.detailed_description: A progressive approach for SNP calling and haplotype assembly using Single Molecule Real-Time (SMRT) sequencing data.

tools.name: GBS-SNP-CROP
tools.one_line_profile: Genotyping-by-Sequencing (GBS) SNP calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for SNP calling from Genotyping-by-Sequencing (GBS) data, designed to work with or without a reference genome.

tools.name: guacamole
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-based variant calling engine
tools.detailed_description: A variant calling tool built on Apache Spark, supporting experimental multi-sample somatic calling and local assembly.

tools.name: snpArcher
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for variant calling in non-model organisms
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallel variant calling workflow built with Snakemake, designed for ease of use in non-model organism genomics.

tools.name: VCF.Filter
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical tool for filtering VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Java application for graphically filtering and prioritizing genomic sequence variants reported in VCF files based on custom annotations.

tools.name: MapCaller
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated short-read alignment and variant detection
tools.detailed_description: An efficient and versatile tool that combines short-read alignment and variant detection into a single process for high-throughput sequenced genomes.

tools.name: NanoSNP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based SNP caller for Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based method to identify SNPs from low-coverage Nanopore sequencing reads.

tools.name: vcf2prot
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated VCF to proteome converter
tools.detailed_description: A tool to accelerate the generation of personalized proteomes from a Variant Calling Format (VCF) file and a reference proteome using GPUs.

tools.name: SmartRNASeqCaller
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing for RNA-Seq germline variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A post-processing pipeline designed to improve the accuracy of germline variant calling from RNA-Seq data.

tools.name: Circle-Map
tools.one_line_profile: Circular DNA detection from short reads
tools.detailed_description: A method for detecting circular DNA (eccDNA) based on probabilistic mapping of ultrashort reads.

tools.name: pandora
tools.one_line_profile: Pan-genome inference and genotyping tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for pan-genome inference and genotyping that works with long noisy reads or short accurate reads.

tools.name: GATK-flow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow implementation of GATK HaplotypeCaller
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementation of the GATK HaplotypeCaller workflow for germline variant calling.

tools.name: polishCLR
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for polishing CLR assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for polishing Continuous Long Read (CLR) assemblies, often used to correct errors and improve consensus sequences.

tools.name: clinical-filter
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical variant filtering for trio data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering genetic variants in VCFs from trio-based sequencing data, specifically for clinical review purposes.

tools.name: needLR
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant filtering for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering and prioritizing structural variants detected in long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: piper
tools.one_line_profile: Genomics pipeline built on GATK Queue
tools.detailed_description: A genomics pipeline framework built on top of GATK Queue, used for processing sequencing data.

tools.name: alpaca
tools.one_line_profile: Algebraic caller for genomic variants
tools.detailed_description: A variant caller for SNPs and small indels that uses an algebraic approach to incorporate sample-based filtering directly into the calling process.

tools.name: scSplit
tools.one_line_profile: Genotype-free demultiplexing of pooled scRNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for genotype-free demultiplexing of pooled single-cell RNA-Seq data using a hidden state model to identify genetically distinct samples.

tools.name: nf-GATK_Exome_Preprocess
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow GATK Exome Preprocessing Workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline adapted from GATK best practices for preprocessing whole exome sequencing (WES) data.

tools.name: gatk-snp-calling
tools.one_line_profile: Shell-based GATK SNP calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive shell script pipeline for performing SNP calling using GATK.

tools.name: MetaProFi
tools.one_line_profile: Bloom filter-based sequence querying tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing Bloom filters for storing and querying sequence data to accurately identify functionally relevant genetic variants.

tools.name: RedDog
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for read mapping, SNP calling, and annotation in bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for bacterial genomics, handling read mapping, SNP calling, and annotation tasks, specifically tailored for phylogenetic analysis.

tools.name: Dysgu
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant caller for short and long reads
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for calling structural variants (SVs) using paired-end short reads or long reads (Nanopore/PacBio), focusing on efficiency and accuracy.

tools.name: Kids First Joint Genotyping Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Joint genotyping workflow for the Kids First Data Resource Center
tools.detailed_description: A production-grade Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflow for performing joint genotyping on large cohorts, developed for the Kids First DRC.

tools.name: PEPPER
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based variant caller for Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A genome-scale variant calling pipeline for Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) data, integrating PEPPER (RNN-based candidate generation), Margin (HMM-based phasing), and DeepVariant.

tools.name: popvae
tools.one_line_profile: Genotype dimensionality reduction using Variational Autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: A tool for population genetic analysis that uses Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) to perform dimensionality reduction on genotype data, visualizing population structure.

tools.name: CuteVariant
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for filtering genomic variations
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly graphical interface for filtering and exploring VCF files, designed to help researchers analyze genomic variation data without complex command-line operations.

tools.name: bgt
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient genotype query tool for large-scale datasets
tools.detailed_description: A compact file format and command-line tool for storing and querying genotypes from tens of thousands of samples, enabling fast access to large-scale population data.

tools.name: dipcall
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-based variant calling for phased haplotype assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for generating variant calls (SNPs/INDELs) from a pair of phased haplotype assemblies by aligning them to a reference genome.

tools.name: fermikit
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembly-based variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for de novo assembly of Illumina short reads and subsequent variant calling, useful for detecting structural variants and variants in divergent regions.

tools.name: hapdip
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and scripts for single-sample variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Provides the CHM1-NA12878 benchmark for evaluating single-sample SNP/INDEL calling performance from WGS Illumina data.

tools.name: panmask
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate mask regions for variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Generates genomic regions that are difficult to map or analyze, helping to filter false positives in short-read variant calling.

tools.name: DeepVariant-Nextflow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow implementation of the DeepVariant pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline wrapper for Google's DeepVariant tool, facilitating scalable and reproducible variant calling on various infrastructure.

tools.name: PureCN
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number calling and variant classification for targeted sequencing
tools.detailed_description: An R package for copy number calling, tumor purity estimation, and variant classification using targeted short-read sequencing data.

tools.name: SVJedi
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant genotyping with long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for genotyping structural variants (SVs) using long-read sequencing data, improving the accuracy of SV detection in population studies.

tools.name: SNPBac
tools.one_line_profile: SNP and variant calling pipeline for bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for bacterial variant calling, automating the process of mapping and SNP detection for microbial genomics.

tools.name: Octopus
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian haplotype-based mutation calling tool
tools.detailed_description: A sophisticated variant caller that uses a Bayesian haplotype-based model to detect germline and somatic variants (SNPs, INDELs, and complex variants) with high accuracy.

tools.name: TeamTeri
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics workflows for cloud platforms (GCP/AWS/Azure)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL workflows and scripts for running bioinformatics analyses, including variant calling, on major cloud platforms.

tools.name: McCortex
tools.one_line_profile: De novo genome assembly and multisample variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo assembly and variant calling that leverages cortex graphs to handle multi-sample data effectively.

tools.name: adVNTR
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for genotyping Variable Number Tandem Repeats (VNTRs)
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for genotyping Variable Number Tandem Repeats (VNTRs) from sequence data, using Hidden Markov Models for accurate repeat count estimation.

tools.name: Variant Calling Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Simple variant calling and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based pipeline using Rubra/Ruffus to orchestrate BWA, GATK, and Ensembl tools for variant calling and annotation.

tools.name: Pipette
tools.one_line_profile: Variant discovery and annotation wrapper
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby wrapper/pipeline for automating variant discovery and annotation tasks using standard tools like GATK and Ensembl.

tools.name: libplinkio
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reading PLINK genotype files
tools.detailed_description: A C and Python library designed to read PLINK genotype files (BED/BIM/FAM), facilitating the development of tools that interact with this common format.

tools.name: Nanopore SV Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for Nanopore structural variant filtering and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts for filtering and analyzing structural variants called from Nanopore human whole-genome sequencing data.

tools.name: Pwrake Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics workflows using Pwrake
tools.detailed_description: Workflows for bioinformatics analysis, specifically utilizing GATK and Dindel for variant calling, orchestrated via Pwrake.

tools.name: spVCF
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Project VCF for efficient genotype encoding
tools.detailed_description: An evolution of the VCF format designed to encode population genotype matrices efficiently using sparse projection, reducing storage requirements for large cohorts.

tools.name: Ancient mtDNA Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for ancient mtDNA target enrichment analysis
tools.detailed_description: A specialized pipeline for processing paired-end Illumina reads from ancient mitochondrial DNA target enrichment capture, including mapping and variant analysis.

tools.name: grenepipe
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible pipeline for automated variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A scalable and reproducible pipeline for automating variant calling from raw sequence reads, supporting both individual samples and pool sequencing.

tools.name: SystemsGenetics
tools.one_line_profile: Java tools for genotype reading, QTL mapping, and alignment
tools.detailed_description: A suite of Java tools for reading/writing genotypes, performing QTL mapping, and strand alignment, supporting systems genetics research.

tools.name: T1K
tools.one_line_profile: Genotyping tool for highly polymorphic genes (KIR, HLA)
tools.detailed_description: A method to genotype highly polymorphic genes such as KIR and HLA using bulk or single-cell RNA-seq, WGS, or WES data.

tools.name: napu_wf
tools.one_line_profile: WDL workflows for ONT variant calling and assembly
tools.detailed_description: A set of WDL workflows designed for variant calling and genome assembly using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/rnavar
tools.one_line_profile: RNA variant calling pipeline using GATK4
tools.detailed_description: An nf-core pipeline for calling variants from RNA-seq data, following GATK best practices for RNA variant discovery.

tools.name: nf-core/sarek
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for germline and somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A widely used nf-core pipeline for detecting germline or somatic variants from Whole Genome or Targeted Sequencing data, handling preprocessing to annotation.

tools.name: nf-core/variantbenchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for benchmarking variant calling methods
tools.detailed_description: An nf-core pipeline designed to evaluate and validate the accuracy and performance of various variant calling tools and methods.

tools.name: nf-core/viralrecon
tools.one_line_profile: Viral assembly and variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An nf-core pipeline for the assembly and intrahost/low-frequency variant calling of viral samples (e.g., SARS-CoV-2) from Illumina or Nanopore data.

tools.name: MTBseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Mycobacterium tuberculosis variant calling
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline for mapping, variant calling, and detection of resistance-mediating variants in Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex isolates.

tools.name: GermlineMutationCalling
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for germline mutation calling
tools.detailed_description: An adaptable Snakemake workflow implementing GATK best practices for germline mutation calling from BAM files.

tools.name: Lancet2
tools.one_line_profile: Microassembly based somatic variant caller for NGS data (v2)
tools.detailed_description: Lancet2 is a somatic variant caller that uses localized micro-assembly to detect somatic variants (SNVs and Indels) with high sensitivity and precision, particularly in difficult-to-call regions.

tools.name: Lancet
tools.one_line_profile: Microassembly based somatic variant caller for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: Lancet is a somatic variant caller that uses colored de Bruijn graphs for localized micro-assembly to detect somatic variants in tumor-normal pairs.

tools.name: GLIMPSE
tools.one_line_profile: Phasing and imputation for low-coverage sequencing
tools.detailed_description: GLIMPSE is a set of tools for phasing and genotype imputation for low-coverage sequencing data, optimized for large reference panels.

tools.name: GATK4 Best Practice Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow implementation of GATK4 Best Practice for Germline Variant Calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the GATK4 Best Practices for germline variant calling, including alignment, duplicate marking, BQSR, and HaplotypeCaller.

tools.name: GenoPred
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genotype-based prediction and polygenic risk scores
tools.detailed_description: GenoPred is a pipeline for performing genotype-based prediction, including quality control, linkage disequilibrium estimation, and polygenic risk score calculation.

tools.name: ngs_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Exome/Capture/RNASeq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake pipeline for analyzing NGS data, supporting Exome, Capture, and RNA-Seq data processing from raw reads to variant calling.

tools.name: Kestrel
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping-free variant caller for short-read Illumina data
tools.detailed_description: Kestrel is a variant caller that detects variants directly from short-read data without prior mapping to a reference genome, useful for identifying variants in high-diversity regions.

tools.name: VariantNET
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network for calling variants from single molecule reads
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach using a simple neural network to call heterozygous and homozygous variants from alignments of single molecule reads (e.g., PacBio) to a reference.

tools.name: PhenoScanner
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to query the PhenoScanner database
tools.detailed_description: An R package that allows users to query the PhenoScanner database of genotype-phenotype associations, facilitating Mendelian randomization and post-GWAS analysis.

tools.name: QuASAR
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative Allele Specific Analysis of Reads
tools.detailed_description: QuASAR is an R package for joint genotyping and Allele Specific Expression (ASE) inference from RNA-seq data, accounting for base-calling errors and over-dispersion.

tools.name: 2vcf
tools.one_line_profile: Convert consumer genetics raw data to VCF format
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to convert raw genotype calls from direct-to-consumer services like 23andMe or Ancestry.com into standard VCF format with dbSNP annotations.

tools.name: Pysam
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for reading and manipulating genomic data (SAM/BAM/VCF)
tools.detailed_description: Pysam is a Python module for reading, manipulating, and writing genomics data sets. It is a lightweight wrapper of the HTSlib C-API, providing access to SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF/BCF files.

tools.name: fastStructure
tools.one_line_profile: Variational framework for inferring population structure from SNP data
tools.detailed_description: fastStructure is an algorithm for inferring population structure from large SNP genotype data using a variational Bayesian framework, offering faster performance than traditional MCMC methods.

tools.name: GQT
tools.one_line_profile: Genotype Query Tools for efficient VCF querying
tools.detailed_description: GQT (Genotype Query Tools) is a tool that indexes VCF files to enable extremely fast queries based on genotypes, sample phenotypes, and variant annotations.

tools.name: BCFtools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for variant calling and manipulating VCF/BCF files
tools.detailed_description: BCFtools is a set of utilities that manipulate variant calls in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart (BCF). It includes tools for variant calling (mpileup/call), filtering, and statistics.

tools.name: GATK4 Germline SNPs Indels
tools.one_line_profile: Seqera Labs Nextflow workflow for GATK4 germline variant discovery
tools.detailed_description: A curated Nextflow workflow by Seqera Labs for germline short variant discovery using GATK4, following best practices for reproducibility and scalability.

tools.name: Isaac Variant Caller
tools.one_line_profile: Illumina's legacy variant caller (Strelka predecessor)
tools.detailed_description: Isaac Variant Caller is a high-performance variant caller developed by Illumina. Although deprecated in favor of Strelka, it remains a significant tool in the history of variant calling.

tools.name: SiNVICT
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-sensitive detection of SNVs and Indels in ctDNA
tools.detailed_description: SiNVICT is a tool designed for the ultra-sensitive detection of Single Nucleotide Variants (SNVs) and Indels in Circulating Tumour DNA (ctDNA) sequencing data.

tools.name: vcztools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for VCF Zarr format (sgkit ecosystem)
tools.detailed_description: A partial reimplementation of bcftools designed to work with VCF data stored in Zarr format, part of the sgkit (Statistical Genetics Toolkit) ecosystem.

tools.name: cellSNP
tools.one_line_profile: Pileup biallelic SNPs from single-cell and bulk RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: cellSNP is a tool for genotyping single cells by piling up reads at known biallelic SNP positions, useful for donor deconvolution and allele-specific expression analysis.

tools.name: cellsnp-lite
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient genotyping of bi-allelic SNPs on single cells (C implementation)
tools.detailed_description: cellsnp-lite is the C/C++ implementation of cellSNP, providing highly efficient genotyping of bi-allelic SNPs in single-cell data with significantly improved performance.

tools.name: Vireo
tools.one_line_profile: Demultiplexing pooled scRNA-seq data using genotype information
tools.detailed_description: Vireo is a Bayesian method for demultiplexing pooled single-cell RNA-seq data, capable of assigning cells to donors with or without a genotype reference.

tools.name: QC3
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control tool for DNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: QC3 is a quality control tool designed for DNA sequencing data, covering raw data, alignment, and variant calling stages to identify potential issues.

tools.name: Snakemake GATK Variant Calling
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for GATK best-practices workflow
tools.detailed_description: A community-maintained Snakemake pipeline implementing the GATK best-practices workflow for DNA-seq variant calling.

tools.name: Snakemake Varlociraptor
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for variant calling with Varlociraptor
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for calling small and structural variants using Varlociraptor, supporting various scenarios like tumor/normal and pedigree analysis.

tools.name: SNPbinner
tools.one_line_profile: Generation of genotype crossover points and binmaps
tools.detailed_description: SNPbinner is a utility for generating genotype crossover points and binmaps based on SNP data, particularly useful for recombinant inbred lines (RILs).

tools.name: liftOverPlink
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for liftOver to convert PLINK genotype data
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper script that uses the UCSC liftOver tool to convert PLINK genotype data (BED/BIM/FAM) between different genome reference builds.

tools.name: GotCloud
tools.one_line_profile: Genomes on the Cloud mapping and variant calling pipelines
tools.detailed_description: GotCloud (Genomes on the Cloud) is a set of pipelines for sequence alignment and variant calling, developed by the Center for Statistical Genetics at the University of Michigan.

tools.name: Savvy
tools.one_line_profile: C++ interface to various variant calling formats
tools.detailed_description: Savvy is a C++ library that provides a high-performance interface for reading and manipulating variant calling formats like VCF and BCF.

tools.name: HipSTR
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype inference and phasing for Short Tandem Repeats (STRs)
tools.detailed_description: A tool for genotyping and phasing short tandem repeats (STRs) using Illumina whole-genome sequencing data, designed to handle PCR stutter artifacts.

tools.name: QBRC-Somatic-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic mutation calling pipeline from QBRC
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for somatic mutation calling, integrating multiple callers and filtering steps, developed by the Quantitative Biomedical Research Center.

tools.name: rdxon
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free FASTQ filter for rare variants
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool to filter FASTQ files for rare germline and somatic variants without requiring a reference genome alignment first.

tools.name: parascopy
tools.one_line_profile: CNV estimation and variant calling for duplicated genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for copy number estimation and variant calling specifically in duplicated genes using whole-genome sequencing (WGS) data.

tools.name: nullarbor
tools.one_line_profile: Automated reads-to-report pipeline for public health microbiology
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to generate clinical microbiology reports from sequencing reads, including species identification, MLST, and variant calling.

tools.name: snippy
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid haploid variant calling and core genome alignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid variant calling (SNPs/Indels) and core genome alignment, specifically optimized for haploid genomes like bacteria.

tools.name: PHEnix
tools.one_line_profile: Public Health England SNP calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A SNP calling pipeline developed by Public Health England (UKHSA) for analyzing whole genome sequencing data.

tools.name: prosic2
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic variant caller (Version 2)
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the PROSIC caller, designed for detecting somatic variants in sequencing data.

tools.name: varlociraptor
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-aware variant calling with FDR control
tools.detailed_description: A flexible variant caller that uses a Bayesian approach to handle uncertainty and provides parameter-free filtration via False Discovery Rate (FDR) control.

tools.name: vcflib
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library and tools for VCF manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library and command-line toolkit for parsing, manipulating, and filtering VCF (Variant Call Format) files.

tools.name: joint-genotype
tools.one_line_profile: GATK joint genotyping accelerator
tools.detailed_description: A package developed by Verily Life Sciences to speed up GATK joint genotyping by sharding inputs into smaller pieces for parallel processing.

tools.name: SNP-ML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning based SNP calling for polyploids
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning dependent tool designed for SNP calling specifically in polyploidy organisms.

tools.name: VariantBam
tools.one_line_profile: Region-specific BAM filtering and profiling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering and profiling next-generation sequencing data (BAM files) using region-specific rules to reduce file size or focus analysis.

tools.name: svaba
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variation and indel detection by local assembly
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting structural variations (SVs) and indels in sequencing data using a local assembly approach.

tools.name: souporcell
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering scRNA-seq data by genotypes
tools.detailed_description: A method for clustering single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data based on genotypes, enabling demultiplexing of mixed samples without reference genotypes.

tools.name: MuSE
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic point mutation caller
tools.detailed_description: A somatic point mutation caller that models the evolution of the tumor transcriptional profile to detect variants.

tools.name: smCounter
tools.one_line_profile: UMI-aware variant caller for low allele fractions
tools.detailed_description: A versatile UMI-aware variant caller designed to detect both somatic and germline SNVs and indels, particularly effective for very low allele fraction variants.

tools.name: Psi-caller
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight short read-based variant caller
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight variant caller for short-read sequencing data, aiming for high speed and accuracy.

tools.name: duet
tools.one_line_profile: SNP-assisted SV calling and phasing using ONT
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Structural Variation (SV) calling and phasing using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) data, leveraging SNP information.

tools.name: snappy
tools.one_line_profile: Genotype data browser and interpreter
tools.detailed_description: A tool to browse and interpret personal genotype data (e.g., from 23andMe), providing visualization and annotation of variants.
